description.value:
Consumable (Substance)

This grog features a pungent odor and a strong kick. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next 10 minutes, the creature experiences a high that increases their current and maximum tech points by [[/r 2d6]]. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or experience a low that lasts 1 hour, their current and maximum tech points are reduced by [[/r 2d6]]. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw to resist addiction.

Â 

Novanian grog

This grog features a pungent odor and a strong kick. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next minute, the creature experiences a high that increases their current and maximum tech points by [[/r 2d3]]. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or experience a low that lasts 10 minutes, their current and maximum tech points are reduced by [[/r 2d3]]. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw to resist addiction.
